p: We estimated the reproduction number R 0 = 1.16 (95%CI: 1.07-1.30). This value is similar to many previous estimates based on non-genetic data for seasonal influenza in humans which according to the recent review in [ 33] have an interquartile range of 1.18-1.27 for H3N2. Bettancourt et al. [ 34] estimated R 0 = 1.22 for the 2004-05 H3N2 seasonal influenza epidemic in the entire USA using weekly case report data. An uninformative prior was used for R 0 in the PhyDyn analysis.
